keyFacts: The FBI was actively working on estimates related to Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein as of May 2020.
The email indicates ongoing investigative activity by the FBI regarding the Epstein case.
The correspondence is between FBI agents, showing internal communication about the case.
